@NonNullApi

程序包 org.springframework.data.querydsl.binding

Base classes to implement CDI support for repositories.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    MultiValueBinding<T extends <any>,S>
    MultiValueBinding creates a Predicate out of given Path and collection value.
    OptionalValueBinding<T extends <any>,S>
    OptionalValueBinding creates a Predicate out of given Path and value.
    QuerydslBinderCustomizer<T extends <any>>
    A component that will customize QuerydslBindings for the given entity path.
    SingleValueBinding<T extends <any>,S>
    SingleValueBinding creates a Predicate out of given Path and value.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    QuerydslBindings
    QuerydslBindings allows definition of path specific bindings.
    QuerydslBindingsFactory
    Factory to create QuerydslBindings using an EntityPathResolver.
    QuerydslPredicateBuilder
    Builder assembling Predicate out of PropertyValues.
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    QuerydslPredicate
    Annotation to customize the binding of HTTP request parameters to a Querydsl com.querydsl.core.types.Predicate in Spring MVC handler methods.

程序包org.springframework.data.querydsl.binding的说明

Base classes to implement CDI support for repositories.
